column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This place is HUGE. The most cavernous of cavernous restaurants compared to others in the area. This is because it is Lettuce Entertain You
column2: which is probably the reason for its slight meh-ness some nights. I am not sure if people know this. Normally people are such chain snobs that I'm surprised it's not pointed out more frequently here.
